definition[0]: in an important way or to an important degree
example[0]: Health problems can be significantly reduced by careful diet.
example[1]: Methods used by younger teachers differ significantly from those used by older ones.
example[2]: Deliaâ€™s work has been significantly better this year.
definition[1]: used to say that something is very important
example[3]: The Democrats, significantly, finished well behind the Green Party.
definition[2]: in a way that seems to have a special meaning
example[4]: George paused, and glanced significantly in my direction.
